cast.overview: After his life is turned upside down when his wife is killed in a London terrorist attack, a brilliant but introverted CIA decoder takes matters into his own hands when his supervisors refuse to take action.
cast.title: The Amateur

details.biography:
Tiffany Gray was drawn to the arts at a very young age. She played piano before learning to sing, writing her first song at the age of seven. Next, she discovered a passion for acting. Gray performed in community theatre and school productions in Dubai, then in America, where she attended the Douglas Anderson School of the Arts in Jacksonville, Florida

Gray’s aspirations took her to Los Angeles, then to New York City, where she trained at Circle in the Square Theatre School. Afterward, she embarked on two years of solo backpacking, traveling to places such as Indonesia, Nepal, India, Ireland, New Zealand, Poland, France, Italy, and the Netherlands. She considers this time of exploration to be a major influence.

She graduated RADA in 2023 receiving her BA in Acting Degree (H Level)
details.name: Tiffany Gray
